Producer: Bob Cooper, Michael Birnbaum, Karen Lunder
Sound Mix: SDDS, Dolby Digital, DTS, Dolby SRD
Synopsis: After discovering they are all dating the same same guy (Jesse Metcalfe), three popular students from different cliques band together for revenge, so they enlist the help of a new gal in town and conspire to break the jerk's heart, while destroying his reputation.
Title: John Tucker Must Die
